```{r load_counts, message=FALSE, cache=TRUE, cache.lazy=FALSE, autodep=TRUE}
# HsLm
count_files <- Sys.glob(HSLM_CONFIG$input_count_tables)
ids <- file_path_sans_ext(basename(count_files))

# support old/new hpgltools
hslm_inf_count_table = tryCatch({
    read_counts_expt(ids, count_files)
}, error = function(e) {
    expt_read_counts(ids, count_files)
})
hslm_inf_sample_ids <- as.character(HSLM_CONFIG$samples[[HSLM_CONFIG$sample_id]])
hslm_inf_count_table <- hslm_inf_count_table[,hslm_inf_sample_ids]

# HsLmUI
count_files <- Sys.glob(HSLMUI_CONFIG$input_count_tables)
ids <- file_path_sans_ext(basename(count_files))

hslm_uninf_count_table = tryCatch({
    read_counts_expt(ids, count_files)
}, error = function(e) {
    expt_read_counts(ids, count_files)
})
hslm_uninf_sample_ids <- as.character(HSLMUI_CONFIG$samples[[HSLMUI_CONFIG$sample_id]])
hslm_uninf_count_table <- hslm_uninf_count_table[,hslm_uninf_sample_ids]
```
